history.proof: hfcrush use: cA_1_cA, cA_bottom, cA_1_bottom inv: sumbool.

original: intros m k x y Hmap Hx Hy Hnsucc Hbottom. assert (Htopx : top m k x = x) by (apply nosucc_top; auto). assert (Hbotx : bottom m k x = x) by (apply nopred_bottom; auto). rewrite Hbotx in Hbottom. rewrite <- Hbottom in Hbotx. rewrite (top_bottom m k y) in Htopx; auto. congruence.
